module union_find
    implicit none
    type UnionFindTree
        integer :: n
        integer, allocatable :: par(:)
        integer, allocatable :: rank(:)
    end type

contains

    subroutine init_union_find(utf, n)
        type(UnionFindTree), intent(out) :: utf
        integer, intent(in) :: n
        integer :: i

        utf%n = n
        allocate(utf%par(0:n-1))
        allocate(utf%rank(0:n-1))
        do i = 0, n-1
            utf%par(i) = i
            utf%rank(i) = 0
        end do
    end subroutine

    recursive subroutine find(utf, x, root)
        type(UnionFindTree), intent(inout) :: utf
        integer, intent(in) :: x
        integer, intent(out) :: root
        integer :: current, parent

        current = x
        do while (utf%par(current) /= current)
            current = utf%par(current)
        end do
        root = current

        ! Path compression
        current = x
        do while (current /= root)
            parent = utf%par(current)
            utf%par(current) = root
            current = parent
        end do
    end subroutine

    subroutine unite(utf, x, y)
        type(UnionFindTree), intent(inout) :: utf
        integer, intent(in) :: x, y
        integer :: x_root, y_root

        call find(utf, x, x_root)
        call find(utf, y, y_root)

        if (x_root == y_root) return

        if (utf%rank(x_root) < utf%rank(y_root)) then
            utf%par(x_root) = y_root
        else
            utf%par(y_root) = x_root
            if (utf%rank(x_root) == utf%rank(y_root)) then
                utf%rank(x_root) = utf%rank(x_root) + 1
            end if
        end if
    end subroutine

end module union_find
